title: Summer's Edge
description: Short stories by 13 authors. This is book one in the Summer's Edge collection where not all relationships are meant to last.Stories include:Ellie’s Head by Robb GrindstaffOctopus Rules by Simon P. ClarkA Real Girl by Matt SinclairJust a Perfect Day by Shawn ProctorChildren of the Trees by R.S. MelletteCradle and All by Amanda HillThe Siren’s Gift by A.M. SupingerMornings on the Beach by Ken StaleySummer Soulmates by Tista RayIndiscretions by Cat WoodsPlan B by Samantha EndersIrreplaceable by Julie HutchingsDrowning Man by Jennifer Prescott
author: Matt Sinclair
